content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))

### Copper cable factory
No factory found for copper cable production

### Transport system
Consists of following entities
- Belt ((x=63.5 y=-52.5) -> (x=63.5 y=-54.5), direction=Direction.UP)
- Belt ((x=64.5 y=-52.5) -> (x=64.5 y=-54.5), direction=Direction.UP)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting items into boiler: 
  - Make sure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler.
* Errors when boiler is out of fuel: 
  - Ensure the boiler has a sufficient amount of fuel to operate.
* Errors when generator is not connected: 
  - Ensure the generator is connected to a power source and has the necessary fluid connections.
* Errors when offshore pump is not working: 
  - Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to the fluid system and has a sufficient power supply.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
Important variables assigned:
* transport-belt: 8
* small-electric-pole: 1
* wood: 7
* iron-ore: 10
* copper-ore: 10
* iron-plate: 7
* copper-plate: 5
* copper-cable: 2
* iron-gear-wheel: 2
